name: Surfing an Overhead Wave
description: A round multi-colored and multi-textured stained glass window of a  surfer in an an overhead wave.  The window, as pictured here, is hanging in a beach house in Playa Negra Costa Rica with the setting sun shining through the window.  It is 3 feet in diameter; unframed with a 3/4 inch zinc boarder; $1400 plus $150 for shipping within the U.S. includes a wooden box to protect glass. Made when ordered and shipped within 30 days. Custom sizes available at $200 per square foot; call to order custom sizes: 808-358-1373.

name: Surfer Tubed in Hawaii at Sunset
description: Multiple colors and textures of leaded stained glass of a surfer coming out of a tube toward an orange Hawaiian sunset; unframed with 3/4 inch zinc boarder; 1 1/2  x 2 feet; $600 plus $50 for shipping within the U.S. includes a wooden box to protect the glass.  Made when ordered and shipped within 30 days.  Custom sizes available at $200 per square foot call to order custom sizes: 808-358-1373.

name: Wave
description: Multiple colors and textures of blue leaded stained glass; unframed with 3/4 inch zinc boarder; 1 X 1 1/2 feet; $300 plus $50 shipping in the U.S. includes wooden box to protect glass.  Window is made when ordered and shipped within 30 days.  Custom sizes are available at $200 per square foot; call to order custom sizes:  808-358-1373.
